title: Save the children: Christmas carols and festive songs
brief_description: Christmas songs sung by the London companies of recent stage hits such as “Les Miserables”, “Cats”, “Chess” and “The Phantom of the Opera”. The singers include Elaine Paige, David Essex and Michael Crawford. The songs are sung in full costume and include “Ding Dong Merrily on High”, “Away in a Manger”, “White Christmas”, “God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen”, “In the Bleak Midwinter”, “Silent Night”, “Let’s Pretend”, “Save the Children”, “O Come All Ye Faithful” and “Rudolph the Red Nosed Reindeer”.
